TextBlock.Text: POKE: The advanced warp core has been installed. The <Color=orange>Ash Twin Project</Color> is now complete and ready to operate when the Sun Station comes online.

POKE: Be sure to maintain a safe distance from the core when it activates. While the implications of temporal cloning are fascinating, we do not know how the <Color=orange>Ash Twin Project</Color> will handle an increase in population between loops.
